chapter.1.quest.1.description.1:
本教程将指导你了解一些基本功能。别担心，不会花你&o太长时间&or的！


首先，点击“&9任务&r”下的复选标记，然后领取&6任务奖励&r。之后会出现新任务。


如果新的任务没有出现，请尝试重进你的世界。
chapter.1.quest.1.subtitle: 要开始学习本教程，请点击此任务并阅读描述。
chapter.1.quest.1.task.1.title: 点我！
chapter.1.quest.1.title: &e欢迎来到中世纪的MC！
chapter.1.quest.2.description.1:
首先，屏幕左上角的图标是&aFTB团队&r按钮。你可以用它把其他玩家添加到你的团队。

其次，在&aFTB团队&r图标的右侧是&6任务&r图标，你可以用它随时随地打开&6任务&r。

然后，在&6任务&r图标的右侧是&9FTB区块&r按钮。点击它，选择并声明区块，可以防止其他玩家或生物破坏你的区块。如果你在声明的区块上按住Shift点击可以切换为强加载区块。在强加载区块中，作物、熔炉等会像玩家在旁边时一样生长和运转。

其次，在你的背包上方有一个书的图标。通过点击这本书，你可以查看并升级你的&9技能&r。技能点可以通过获得&a经验&r而获得。

最后，当鼠标悬停在盔甲槽上时，你可以看到你的&8饰品栏&r。某些物品，比如鞘翅和不死图腾可以装备在这里。

试着将任务奖励中的&c生命符咒&r放入饰品栏中吧！
chapter.1.quest.2.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！记得用鼠标向下滑。
chapter.1.quest.2.task.1.title: 物品栏
chapter.1.quest.2.title: &2物品栏
chapter.1.quest.3.description.1:
&9任务目标&r是需要被完成的任务。如果任务目标是一个物品，左键点击它将会展示它的配方（来源）。

&6任务奖励&是你完成了所有&9任务目标&r后得到的奖赏。点击以领取奖励。

点击任务后位于任务右上角的大头针图标可以令任务时刻显示在你的屏幕上。
chapter.1.quest.3.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！
chapter.1.quest.3.task.1.title: 任务
chapter.1.quest.3.title: &6任务
chapter.1.quest.4.description.1:
当你鼠标悬停在物品上的时候按&bR键&r可以查看它的配方

当你鼠标悬停在物品上的时候按&bU键&r可以查看它的用途

按&bLeft Alt键&r可以爬行

按&bX键&r可以翻滚

当潜行时使用&b右键&r可以抱起方块或者生物。抱起之后右键别的生物可以让两个生物叠高高。

当使用拥有连锁采掘附魔工具时，按住&b~键&r可以激活连锁采掘

按&bH键&r使用起源技能

当你背部栏位有背包时按&bB键&r可以打开背包

按&bM键&r可以打开世界地图

按&bO键&r可以查看起源信息

如果你有第二起源能力按&b, 键&r可以使用它

按&bR键&r可以标记

按&bF7键&r可以配置标记

按&bF8键&r可以配置脚步声

按&bJ键&r可以打开ShowMeYourSkin盔甲编辑器
chapter.1.quest.4.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！记得用鼠标向下滑。
chapter.1.quest.4.task.1.title: 点我！
chapter.1.quest.4.title: &9重要的键位
chapter.1.quest.5.description.1:
在物品栏的底部，你可能会注意到一个搜索栏。
这就是&dRoughly Enough Items&r，或&dREI&r，搜索栏。
例如，如果你输入“木”，屏幕右侧的&dREI&r物品列表就会显示名称中包含“木”的所有物品。


在搜索开头添加@，就会显示特定模组的物品，例如 @Adorn


在搜索开头添加#，将显示带有特定标签的所有物品，例如#logs


要收藏某个物品，可将其从&dREI&r物品列表拖到屏幕左侧，或悬停在该物品上时按A键。


在浏览特定工作方块的物品配方时，您可以点击工作方块的名称查看可以制作的所有物品。
例如，如果您正在查看甜莓果酱的配方，您可以点击 "烹饪锅 "文字查看所有烹饪锅配方。
chapter.1.quest.5.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！记得用鼠标向下滑。
chapter.1.quest.5.task.1.title: Roughly Enough Items
chapter.1.quest.5.title: &bRoughly Enough Items (REI)
chapter.1.quest.6.description.1:
按&bP键&r查看职业界面。

随着你&5职业&r等级的提升，小属性提升将被解锁，例如提示你的移动速度。

你可以做和你&5职业&r相应的活动来提升等级。例如，商人&5职业&r可以通过和村民交易来提升等级。

在&e中世纪MC&r中，加入和解锁所有的稀有&5职业&都是一样的。
chapter.1.quest.6.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！
chapter.1.quest.6.task.1.title: 职业
chapter.1.quest.6.title: &5职业
chapter.1.quest.7.description.1:
The tutorial is now &afinished&r! 


&a&lMORE QUESTS! &rTo view the rest of the quests, leave this quest screen and put your cursor to the left of the main quest page, where the arrow is.


Feel free to join our &bDiscord &rfor any other questions you may have: https://lunapixel.studio/discord
chapter.1.quest.7.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！
chapter.1.quest.7.task.1.title: &a教程完成！
chapter.1.quest.8.description.1:
&eMedieval MC &rincludes several realism mechanics. The two mods which control these mechanics are &6EnvironmentZ &rand &bDehydration&r.


If you are playing on a Singleplayer world, both of these mods can safely be deleted from the Mods folder in the modpack files. You can also open their configs through the ingame Mods button.


When you are too &cwarm&r, you will start to &4overheat&r. This will put a foggy overlay over your screen. This can be disabled in the &6EnvironmentZ &rconfig. Blazeborn and Daemon origins do not experience heat or thirst, while Yetis do not experience Cold.


There is a Quest Chapter dedicated to these two mechanics if you would like to learn more.


&eMedieval MC &ralso includes the &6Fabric Seasons &rmod. Each season lasts 28 ingame days. Seasons affect the growth of crops. Craft a Calendar to check what season it is.
chapter.1.quest.8.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！记得用鼠标向下滑。
chapter.1.quest.8.task.1.title: Realism
chapter.1.quest.8.title: &dRealism
chapter.1.quest.9.description.1:
&fItems can be trashed by dragging them on top of &4lava buckets &fand then right clicking!


Items can be reforged in an &7Anvil&r. The item needs to be full durability, and you need &dAmethyst Shards&r.


This modpack features &9Chunk Based Experience Moderation&r. This means that, over time, you will get less &aExperience Points &rfrom killing mobs in the same area.


Every &e5,000&r blocks you move away from spawn, mobs will get &b75%&r stronger. They will also drop more &aExperience Points&r!


Depending on the dimension or biome you are in, mobs will be more difficult and drop better gear / more &aExperience Points&r. In order of increasing difficulty: 
&d1&r. Normal Overworld biomes
&d2&r. &bCold&r/&cHot&r biomes
&d3&r. Modded dimensions
&d4&r. The &4Nether
&d5&r. The &5End


&cApples&r can be equipped in the Helmet slot to instantly eat them when hungry.


More &4difficult&r structures have better loot.


PlayerEX levels are capped at &b200&r.
chapter.1.quest.9.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！记得用鼠标向下滑。
chapter.1.quest.9.task.1.title: &c小提示
chapter.1.quest.9.title: &c小提示
chapter.1.title: &d教程
chapter.10.quest.1.description.1:
为了建造前往&e伊甸星环&r的传送门，你需要准备12个&n&6涂蜡&r&6铜块&r、12个&n&6涂蜡&r&6切制铜楼梯&r、4个&d紫水晶块&r、4个&d紫水晶簇&r、1个&e&l金块&r和1个&7打火石&r。

要建造传送门主体，你需要用&6铜块&r建造一个3x3的平台，然后将平台中心的方块替换为&e&l金块&r。

环绕平台放置&6涂蜡切制铜楼梯&r，并用&6铜块&r替换处于角落的楼梯方块。

在你刚才放置的四个&6铜块&r上放置&d紫水晶块&r，然后再在它们顶部放上&d紫水晶簇&r。

用&7打火石&r点燃&e&l金块&r激活传送门。
chapter.10.quest.1.subtitle: 点击此任务查看描述并阅读传送门激活指南。

chapter.11.quest.1.description.1: If you have trypophobia, go into the Resourcepacks menu and enable the Anti-trypophobia resourcepack.
chapter.11.quest.1.subtitle: 只需要朝着&e蜂巢&r或蜂箱投掷&5末影珍珠&r即可进入&6黄蜂领域&r。挖到坐标处于&lY = 0 &r以下或高于&lY = 256&r来离开该维度。当骑乘生物时，被玩家骑乘的动物可以通过活塞推动与玩家一起进入&6黄蜂领域&r。

chapter.11.quest.3.description.1:
When thrown at flowers, the flowers will reproduce.


When thrown at a block, it will create a Pile of Pollen.


Makes pandas sneeze.


Pollinates unpollinated bees.


Spawns mushrooms when thrown at a Mooshroom.


Spawn pumpkin stems when thrown at a Snow Golem.

chapter.17.quest.12.subtitle: To make a &eStraw Golem&r, place a Carved Pumpkin on top of a Hay Bale. &eStraw Golems &rwill harvest and replant crops, and then deposit to nearby containers. You can shift click the golem and then a container to specify which. Each golem will live for 7 days. This can be extended with wheat. If you have an apple in your hand, they will follow you. Every 2 days, they will want an apple to continue working. Iron Golems and farm animals love Straw Golems. Raiders don't.
chapter.17.quest.12.title: Make a &eStraw Golem

chapter.17.quest.21.title: Craft a &6Bartering Station
chapter.17.quest.22.subtitle: Any medium sized entity can be put into a &8Cage&r. Right click to release, shift click on a block to place the &8Cage&r. Chickens that are inside of cages will produce eggs.

chapter.17.quest.36.title: Fish a &5Wooden Crate
chapter.17.quest.37.subtitle: Placing the food that an animal is attracted to will make nearby animals eat the food and then subsequently breed. For example, placing seeds in the trough will make chickens eat from the trough. If two chickens both eat, they will make a baby chicken.
chapter.17.quest.37.title: Craft a &6Feeding Trough
chapter.17.quest.38.subtitle: Lets you view the stats of llamas, horses, and other mounts by simply looking at them with the &6Monocle&r equipped.

chapter.5.quest.3.description.1:
Depending on your surroundings you can get either &bcold &ror &cwarm&r. 


Taking off your armor, or insulating it, is a good way to combat the &bcold&r.


Armor can be insulated using Mammoth Fur and Polar Bear fur in a Smithing Table alongside your armor.


Blazeborn and Daemon origins do not experience heat or thirst, while Yetis do not experience Cold.
chapter.5.quest.3.subtitle: 阅读我的描述！

chapter.9.quest.3.subtitle: To create an &8Elevator&r, first clear out a 3x3 area of any height. Then, place chains on either side of the shaft. Place the &8Elevator Assemblers &ron at the heights you want the &8Elevator &rto go to. The &8Elevator &rcan be activated via &4redstone &ror by right clicking. Make sure the chain goes above the top &8Elevator &rand chains surround both sides.
